params.admin: Address that controls this token (typically the offering diamond)
params.borrower: Address of the borrower/debtor (entity wallet for legal purposes)

accrueInterest().notice: Accrue interest up to current timestamp

makePayment(uint256,uint256).notice: Make a payment on the note
